7421  write_timeout_sec_ = sec;
7422  write_timeout_usec_ = usec;
7423  return *this;
7424 }
7425 
7426 inline Server &Server::set_idle_interval(time_t sec, time_t usec) {
7427  idle_interval_sec_ = sec;
7428  idle_interval_usec_ = usec;
7429  return *this;
7430 }
7431 
7432 inline Server &Server::set_payload_max_length(size_t length) {
7433  payload_max_length_ = length;
7434  return *this;
7435 }
7436 
7437 inline bool Server::bind_to_port(const std::string &host, int port,
7438  int socket_flags) {
7439  auto ret = bind_internal(host, port, socket_flags);
7440  if (ret == -1) { is_decommissioned = true; }
7441  return ret >= 0;
7442 }
7443 inline int Server::bind_to_any_port(const std::string &host, int socket_flags) {
7444  auto ret = bind_internal(host, 0, socket_flags);
7445  if (ret == -1) { is_decommissioned = true; }
7446  return ret;
7447 }
7448 
7449 inline bool Server::listen_after_bind() { return listen_internal(); }
7450 
7451 inline bool Server::listen(const std::string &host, int port,
7452  int socket_flags) {
7453  return bind_to_port(host, port, socket_flags) && listen_internal();
7454 }
7455 
7456 inline bool Server::is_running() const { return is_running_; }
7457 
7458 inline void Server::wait_until_ready() const {
7459  while (!is_running_ && !is_decommissioned) {
7460  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds{1});
7461  }
7462 }
7463 
7464 inline void Server::stop() {
7465  if (is_running_) {
7466  assert(svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET);
7467  std::atomic<socket_t> sock(svr_sock_.exchange(INVALID_SOCKET));
7468  detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
7469  detail::close_socket(sock);
7470  }
7471  is_decommissioned = false;
7472 }
7473 
7474 inline void Server::decommission() { is_decommissioned = true; }
7475 
7476 inline bool Server::parse_request_line(const char *s, Request &req) const {
7477  auto len = strlen(s);
7478  if (len < 2 || s[len - 2] != '\r' || s[len - 1] != '\n') { return false; }
7479  len -= 2;
7480 
7481  {
7482  size_t count = 0;
7483 
7484  detail::split(s, s + len, ' ', [&](const char *b, const char *e) {
7485  switch (count) {
7486  case 0: req.method = std::string(b, e); break;
7487  case 1: req.target = std::string(b, e); break;
7488  case 2: req.version = std::string(b, e); break;
7489  default: break;
7490  }
7491  count++;
7492  });
7493 
7494  if (count != 3) { return false; }
7495  }
7496 
7497  thread_local const std::set<std::string> methods{
7498  "GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE",
7499  "CONNECT", "OPTIONS", "TRACE", "PATCH", "PRI"};
7500 
7501  if (methods.find(req.method) == methods.end()) { return false; }
7502 
7503  if (req.version != "HTTP/1.1" && req.version != "HTTP/1.0") { return false; }
7504 
7505  {
7506  // Skip URL fragment
7507  for (size_t i = 0; i < req.target.size(); i++) {
7508  if (req.target[i] == '#') {
7509  req.target.erase(i);
7510  break;
7511  }
7512  }
7513 
7514  detail::divide(req.target, '?',
7515  [&](const char *lhs_data, std::size_t lhs_size,
7516  const char *rhs_data, std::size_t rhs_size) {
7517  req.path =
7518  decode_path_component(std::string(lhs_data, lhs_size));
7519  detail::parse_query_text(rhs_data, rhs_size, req.params);
7520  });
7521  }
7522 
7523  return true;
7524 }
7525 
7526 inline bool Server::write_response(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
7527  Request &req, Response &res) {
7528  // NOTE: `req.ranges` should be empty, otherwise it will be applied
7529  // incorrectly to the error content.
7530  req.ranges.clear();
7531  return write_response_core(strm, close_connection, req, res, false);
7532 }
7533 
7534 inline bool Server::write_response_with_content(Stream &strm,
7535  bool close_connection,
7536  const Request &req,
7537  Response &res) {
7538  return write_response_core(strm, close_connection, req, res, true);
7539 }
7540 
7541 inline bool Server::write_response_core(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
7542  const Request &req, Response &res,
7543  bool need_apply_ranges) {
7544  assert(res.status != -1);
7545 
7546  if (400 <= res.status && error_handler_ &&
7547  error_handler_(req, res) == HandlerResponse::Handled) {
7548  need_apply_ranges = true;
7549  }
7550 
7551  std::string content_type;
7552  std::string boundary;
7553  if (need_apply_ranges) { apply_ranges(req, res, content_type, boundary); }
7554 
7555  // Prepare additional headers
7556  if (close_connection || req.get_header_value("Connection") == "close") {
7557  res.set_header("Connection", "close");
7558  } else {
7559  std::string s = "timeout=";
7560  s += std::to_string(keep_alive_timeout_sec_);
7561  s += ", max=";
7562  s += std::to_string(keep_alive_max_count_);
7563  res.set_header("Keep-Alive", s);
7564  }
7565 
7566  if ((!res.body.empty() || res.content_length_ > 0 || res.content_provider_) &&
7567  !res.has_header("Content-Type")) {
7568  res.set_header("Content-Type", "text/plain");
7569  }
7570 
7571  if (res.body.empty() && !res.content_length_ && !res.content_provider_ &&
7572  !res.has_header("Content-Length")) {
7573  res.set_header("Content-Length", "0");
7574  }
7575 
7576  if (req.method == "HEAD" && !res.has_header("Accept-Ranges")) {
7577  res.set_header("Accept-Ranges", "bytes");
7578  }
7579 
7580  if (post_routing_handler_) { post_routing_handler_(req, res); }
7581 
7582  // Response line and headers
7583  {
7584  detail::BufferStream bstrm;
7585  if (!detail::write_response_line(bstrm, res.status)) { return false; }
7586  if (!header_writer_(bstrm, res.headers)) { return false; }
7587 
7588  // Flush buffer
7589  auto &data = bstrm.get_buffer();
7590  detail::write_data(strm, data.data(), data.size());
7591  }
7592 
7593  // Body
7594  auto ret = true;
7595  if (req.method != "HEAD") {
7596  if (!res.body.empty()) {
7597  if (!detail::write_data(strm, res.body.data(), res.body.size())) {
7598  ret = false;
7599  }
7600  } else if (res.content_provider_) {
7601  if (write_content_with_provider(strm, req, res, boundary, content_type)) {
7602  res.content_provider_success_ = true;
7603  } else {
7604  ret = false;
7605  }
7606  }
7607  }
7608 
7609  // Log
7610  if (logger_) { logger_(req, res); }
7611 
7612  return ret;
7613 }
7614 
7615 inline bool
7616 Server::write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
7617  Response &res, const std::string &boundary,
7618  const std::string &content_type) {
7619  auto is_shutting_down = [this]() {
7620  return this->svr_sock_ == INVALID_SOCKET;
7621  };
7622 
7623  if (res.content_length_ > 0) {
7624  if (req.ranges.empty()) {
7625  return detail::write_content(strm, res.content_provider_, 0,
7626  res.content_length_, is_shutting_down);
7627  } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
7628  auto offset_and_length = detail::get_range_offset_and_length(
7629  req.ranges[0], res.content_length_);
7630 
7631  return detail::write_content(strm, res.content_provider_,
7632  offset_and_length.first,
7633  offset_and_length.second, is_shutting_down);
7634  } else {
7635  return detail::write_multipart_ranges_data(
7636  strm, req, res, boundary, content_type, res.content_length_,
7637  is_shutting_down);
7638  }
7639  } else {
7640  if (res.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
7641  auto type = detail::encoding_type(req, res);
7642 
7643  std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
7644  if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
7645 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
7646  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
7647 #endif
7648  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
7649 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
7650  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::brotli_compressor>();
7651 #endif
7652  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Zstd) {
7653 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZSTD_SUPPORT
7654  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::zstd_compressor>();
7655 #endif
7656  } else {
7657  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::nocompressor>();
7658  }
7659  assert(compressor != nullptr);
7660 
7661  return detail::write_content_chunked(strm, res.content_provider_,
7662  is_shutting_down, *compressor);
7663  } else {
7664  return detail::write_content_without_length(strm, res.content_provider_,
7665  is_shutting_down);
7666  }
7667  }
7668 }
7669 
7670 inline bool Server::read_content(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res) {
7671  FormFields::iterator cur_field;
7672  FormFiles::iterator cur_file;
7673  auto is_text_field = false;
7674  size_t count = 0;
7675  if (read_content_core(
7676  strm, req, res,
7677  // Regular
7678  [&](const char *buf, size_t n) {
7679  if (req.body.size() + n > req.body.max_size()) { return false; }
7680  req.body.append(buf, n);
7681  return true;
7682  },
7683  // Multipart FormData
7684  [&](const FormData &file) {
7685  if (count++ == CPPHTTPLIB_MULTIPART_FORM_DATA_FILE_MAX_COUNT) {
7686  return false;
7687  }
7688 
7689  if (file.filename.empty()) {
7690  cur_field = req.form.fields.emplace(
7691  file.name, FormField{file.name, file.content, file.headers});
7692  is_text_field = true;
7693  } else {
7694  cur_file = req.form.files.emplace(file.name, file);
7695  is_text_field = false;
7696  }
7697  return true;
7698  },
7699  [&](const char *buf, size_t n) {
7700  if (is_text_field) {
7701  auto &content = cur_field->second.content;
7702  if (content.size() + n > content.max_size()) { return false; }
7703  content.append(buf, n);
7704  } else {
7705  auto &content = cur_file->second.content;
7706  if (content.size() + n > content.max_size()) { return false; }
7707  content.append(buf, n);
7708  }
7709  return true;
7710  })) {
7711  const auto &content_type = req.get_header_value("Content-Type");
7712  if (!content_type.find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")) {
7713  if (req.body.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_FORM_URL_ENCODED_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH) {
7714  res.status = StatusCode::PayloadTooLarge_413; // NOTE: should be 414?
7715  return false;
7716  }
7717  detail::parse_query_text(req.body, req.params);
7718  }
7719  return true;
7720  }
7721  return false;
7722 }
7723 
7724 inline bool Server::read_content_with_content_receiver(
7725  Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res, ContentReceiver receiver,
7726  FormDataHeader multipart_header, ContentReceiver multipart_receiver) {
7727  return read_content_core(strm, req, res, std::move(receiver),
7728  std::move(multipart_header),
7729  std::move(multipart_receiver));
7730 }
7731 
7732 inline bool Server::read_content_core(
7733  Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res, ContentReceiver receiver,
7734  FormDataHeader multipart_header, ContentReceiver multipart_receiver) const {
7735  detail::FormDataParser multipart_form_data_parser;
7736  ContentReceiverWithProgress out;
7737 
7738  if (req.is_multipart_form_data()) {
7739  const auto &content_type = req.get_header_value("Content-Type");
7740  std::string boundary;
7741  if (!detail::parse_multipart_boundary(content_type, boundary)) {
7742  res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
7743  return false;
7744  }
7745 
7746  multipart_form_data_parser.set_boundary(std::move(boundary));
7747  out = [&](const char *buf, size_t n, size_t /*off*/, size_t /*len*/) {
7748  return multipart_form_data_parser.parse(buf, n, multipart_header,
7749  multipart_receiver);
7750  };
7751  } else {
7752  out = [receiver](const char *buf, size_t n, size_t /*off*/,
7753  size_t /*len*/) { return receiver(buf, n); };
7754  }
7755 
7756  if (req.method == "DELETE" && !req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
7757  return true;
7758  }
7759 
7760  if (!detail::read_content(strm, req, payload_max_length_, res.status, nullptr,
7761  out, true)) {
7762  return false;
7763  }
7764 
7765  if (req.is_multipart_form_data()) {
7766  if (!multipart_form_data_parser.is_valid()) {
7767  res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
7768  return false;
7769  }
7770  }
7771 
7772  return true;
7773 }
7774 
7775 inline bool Server::handle_file_request(const Request &req, Response &res) {
7776  for (const auto &entry : base_dirs_) {
7777  // Prefix match
7778  if (!req.path.compare(0, entry.mount_point.size(), entry.mount_point)) {
7779  std::string sub_path = "/" + req.path.substr(entry.mount_point.size());
7780  if (detail::is_valid_path(sub_path)) {
7781  auto path = entry.base_dir + sub_path;
7782  if (path.back() == '/') { path += "index.html"; }
7783 
7784  detail::FileStat stat(path);
7785 
7786  if (stat.is_dir()) {
7787  res.set_redirect(sub_path + "/", StatusCode::MovedPermanently_301);
7788  return true;
7789  }
7790 
7791  if (stat.is_file()) {
7792  for (const auto &kv : entry.headers) {
7793  res.set_header(kv.first, kv.second);
7794  }
7795 
7796  auto mm = std::make_shared<detail::mmap>(path.c_str());
7797  if (!mm->is_open()) { return false; }
7798 
7799  res.set_content_provider(
7800  mm->size(),
7801  detail::find_content_type(path, file_extension_and_mimetype_map_,
7802  default_file_mimetype_),
7803  [mm](size_t offset, size_t length, DataSink &sink) -> bool {
7804  sink.write(mm->data() + offset, length);
7805  return true;
7806  });
7807 
7808  if (req.method != "HEAD" && file_request_handler_) {
7809  file_request_handler_(req, res);
7810  }
7811 
7812  return true;
7813  }
7814  }
7815  }
7816  }
7817  return false;
7818 }
7819 
7820 inline socket_t
7821 Server::create_server_socket(const std::string &host, int port,
7822  int socket_flags,
7823  SocketOptions socket_options) const {
7824  return detail::create_socket(
7825  host, std::string(), port, address_family_, socket_flags, tcp_nodelay_,
7826  ipv6_v6only_, std::move(socket_options),
7827  [](socket_t sock, struct addrinfo &ai, bool & /*quit*/) -> bool {
7828  if (::bind(sock, ai.ai_addr, static_cast<socklen_t>(ai.ai_addrlen))) {
7829  return false;
7830  }
7831  if (::listen(sock, CPPHTTPLIB_LISTEN_BACKLOG)) { return false; }
7832  return true;
7833  });
7834 }
7835 
7836 inline int Server::bind_internal(const std::string &host, int port,
7837  int socket_flags) {
7838  if (is_decommissioned) { return -1; }
7839 
7840  if (!is_valid()) { return -1; }
7841 
7842  svr_sock_ = create_server_socket(host, port, socket_flags, socket_options_);
7843  if (svr_sock_ == INVALID_SOCKET) { return -1; }
7844 
7845  if (port == 0) {
7846  struct sockaddr_storage addr;
7847  socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
7848  if (getsockname(svr_sock_, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&addr),
7849  &addr_len) == -1) {
7850  return -1;
7851  }
7852  if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET) {
7853  return ntohs(reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in *>(&addr)->sin_port);
7854  } else if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET6) {
7855  return ntohs(reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in6 *>(&addr)->sin6_port);
7856  } else {
7857  return -1;
7858  }
7859  } else {
7860  return port;
7861  }
7862 }
7863 
7864 inline bool Server::listen_internal() {
7865  if (is_decommissioned) { return false; }
7866 
7867  auto ret = true;
7868  is_running_ = true;
7869  auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() { is_running_ = false; });
7870 
7871  {
7872  std::unique_ptr<TaskQueue> task_queue(new_task_queue());
7873 
7874  while (svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET) {
7875 #ifndef _WIN64
7876  if (idle_interval_sec_ > 0 || idle_interval_usec_ > 0) {
7877 #endif
7878  auto val = detail::select_read(svr_sock_, idle_interval_sec_,
7879  idle_interval_usec_);
7880  if (val == 0) { // Timeout
7881  task_queue->on_idle();
7882  continue;
7883  }
7884 #ifndef _WIN64
7885  }
7886 #endif
7887 
7888 #if defined _WIN64
7889  // sockets connected via WASAccept inherit flags NO_HANDLE_INHERIT,
7890  // OVERLAPPED
7891  socket_t sock = WSAAccept(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, 0);
7892 #elif defined SOCK_CLOEXEC
7893  socket_t sock = accept4(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr, SOCK_CLOEXEC);
7894 #else
7895  socket_t sock = accept(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr);
7896 #endif
7897 
7898  if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) {
7899  if (errno == EMFILE) {
7900  // The per-process limit of open file descriptors has been reached.
7901  // Try to accept new connections after a short sleep.
7902  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::microseconds{1});
7903  continue;
7904  } else if (errno == EINTR || errno == EAGAIN) {
7905  continue;
7906  }
7907  if (svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET) {
7908  detail::close_socket(svr_sock_);
7909  ret = false;
7910  } else {
7911  ; // The server socket was closed by user.
7912  }
7913  break;
7914  }
7915 
7916  detail::set_socket_opt_time(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
7917  read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_);
7918  detail::set_socket_opt_time(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO,
7919  write_timeout_sec_, write_timeout_usec_);
7920 
7921  if (!task_queue->enqueue(
7922  [this, sock]() { process_and_close_socket(sock); })) {
7923  detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
7924  detail::close_socket(sock);
7925  }
7926  }
7927 
7928  task_queue->shutdown();
7929  }
7930 
7931  is_decommissioned = !ret;
7932  return ret;
7933 }
7934 
7935 inline bool Server::routing(Request &req, Response &res, Stream &strm) {
7936  if (pre_routing_handler_ &&
7937  pre_routing_handler_(req, res) == HandlerResponse::Handled) {
7938  return true;
7939  }
7940 
7941  // File handler
7942  if ((req.method == "GET" || req.method == "HEAD") &&
7943  handle_file_request(req, res)) {
7944  return true;
7945  }
7946 
7947  if (detail::expect_content(req)) {
7948  // Content reader handler
7949  {
7950  ContentReader reader(
7951  [&](ContentReceiver receiver) {
7952  return read_content_with_content_receiver(
7953  strm, req, res, std::move(receiver), nullptr, nullptr);
7954  },
7955  [&](FormDataHeader header, ContentReceiver receiver) {
7956  return read_content_with_content_receiver(strm, req, res, nullptr,
7957  std::move(header),
7958  std::move(receiver));
7959  });
7960 
7961  if (req.method == "POST") {
7962  if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
7963  req, res, std::move(reader),
7964  post_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
7965  return true;
7966  }
7967  } else if (req.method == "PUT") {
7968  if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
7969  req, res, std::move(reader),
7970  put_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
7971  return true;
7972  }
7973  } else if (req.method == "PATCH") {
7974  if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
7975  req, res, std::move(reader),
7976  patch_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
7977  return true;
7978  }
7979  } else if (req.method == "DELETE") {
7980  if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
7981  req, res, std::move(reader),
7982  delete_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
7983  return true;
7984  }
7985  }
7986  }
7987 
7988  // Read content into `req.body`
7989  if (!read_content(strm, req, res)) { return false; }
7990  }
7991 
7992  // Regular handler
7993  if (req.method == "GET" || req.method == "HEAD") {
7994  return dispatch_request(req, res, get_handlers_);
7995  } else if (req.method == "POST") {
7996  return dispatch_request(req, res, post_handlers_);
7997  } else if (req.method == "PUT") {
7998  return dispatch_request(req, res, put_handlers_);
7999  } else if (req.method == "DELETE") {
8000  return dispatch_request(req, res, delete_handlers_);
8001  } else if (req.method == "OPTIONS") {
8002  return dispatch_request(req, res, options_handlers_);
8003  } else if (req.method == "PATCH") {
8004  return dispatch_request(req, res, patch_handlers_);
8005  }
8006 
8007  res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
8008  return false;
8009 }
8010 
8011 inline bool Server::dispatch_request(Request &req, Response &res,
8012  const Handlers &handlers) const {
8013  for (const auto &x : handlers) {
8014  const auto &matcher = x.first;
8015  const auto &handler = x.second;
8016 
8017  if (matcher->match(req)) {
8018  req.matched_route = matcher->pattern();
8019  if (!pre_request_handler_ ||
8020  pre_request_handler_(req, res) != HandlerResponse::Handled) {
8021  handler(req, res);
8022  }
8023  return true;
8024  }
8025  }
8026  return false;
8027 }
8028 
8029 inline void Server::apply_ranges(const Request &req, Response &res,
8030  std::string &content_type,
8031  std::string &boundary) const {
8032  if (req.ranges.size() > 1 && res.status == StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
8033  auto it = res.headers.find("Content-Type");
8034  if (it != res.headers.end()) {
8035  content_type = it->second;
8036  res.headers.erase(it);
8037  }
8038 
8039  boundary = detail::make_multipart_data_boundary();
8040 
8041  res.set_header("Content-Type",
8042  "multipart/byteranges; boundary=" + boundary);
8043  }
8044 
8045  auto type = detail::encoding_type(req, res);
8046 
8047  if (res.body.empty()) {
8048  if (res.content_length_ > 0) {
8049  size_t length = 0;
8050  if (req.ranges.empty() || res.status != StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
8051  length = res.content_length_;
8052  } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
8053  auto offset_and_length = detail::get_range_offset_and_length(
8054  req.ranges[0], res.content_length_);
8055 
8056  length = offset_and_length.second;
8057 
8058  auto content_range = detail::make_content_range_header_field(
8059  offset_and_length, res.content_length_);
8060  res.set_header("Content-Range", content_range);
8061  } else {
8062  length = detail::get_multipart_ranges_data_length(
8063  req, boundary, content_type, res.content_length_);
8064  }
8065  res.set_header("Content-Length", std::to_string(length));
8066  } else {
8067  if (res.content_provider_) {
8068  if (res.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
8069  res.set_header("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked");
8070  if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
8071  res.set_header("Content-Encoding", "gzip");
8072  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
8073  res.set_header("Content-Encoding", "br");
8074  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Zstd) {
8075  res.set_header("Content-Encoding", "zstd");
8076  }
8077  }
8078  }
8079  }
8080  } else {
8081  if (req.ranges.empty() || res.status != StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
8082  ;
8083  } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
8084  auto offset_and_length =
8085  detail::get_range_offset_and_length(req.ranges[0], res.body.size());
8086  auto offset = offset_and_length.first;
8087  auto length = offset_and_length.second;
8088 
8089  auto content_range = detail::make_content_range_header_field(
8090  offset_and_length, res.body.size());
8091  res.set_header("Content-Range", content_range);
8092 
8093  assert(offset + length <= res.body.size());
8094  res.body = res.body.substr(offset, length);
8095  } else {
8096  std::string data;
8097  detail::make_multipart_ranges_data(req, res, boundary, content_type,
8098  res.body.size(), data);
8099  res.body.swap(data);
8100  }
8101 
8102  if (type != detail::EncodingType::None) {
8103  if (pre_compression_logger_) { pre_compression_logger_(req, res); }
8104 
8105  std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
8106  std::string content_encoding;
8107 
8108  if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
8109 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
8110  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
8111  content_encoding = "gzip";
8112 #endif
8113  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
8114 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
8115  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::brotli_compressor>();
8116  content_encoding = "br";
8117 #endif
8118  } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Zstd) {
8119 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZSTD_SUPPORT
8120  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::zstd_compressor>();
8121  content_encoding = "zstd";
8122 #endif
8123  }
8124 
8125  if (compressor) {
8126  std::string compressed;
8127  if (compressor->compress(res.body.data(), res.body.size(), true,
8128  [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
8129  compressed.append(data, data_len);
8130  return true;
8131  })) {
8132  res.body.swap(compressed);
8133  res.set_header("Content-Encoding", content_encoding);
8134  }
8135  }
8136  }
8137 
8138  auto length = std::to_string(res.body.size());
8139  res.set_header("Content-Length", length);
8140  }
8141 }
8142 
8143 inline bool Server::dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
8144  Request &req, Response &res, ContentReader content_reader,
8145  const HandlersForContentReader &handlers) const {
8146  for (const auto &x : handlers) {
8147  const auto &matcher = x.first;
8148  const auto &handler = x.second;
8149 
8150  if (matcher->match(req)) {
8151  req.matched_route = matcher->pattern();
8152  if (!pre_request_handler_ ||
8153  pre_request_handler_(req, res) != HandlerResponse::Handled) {
8154  handler(req, res, content_reader);
8155  }
8156  return true;
8157  }
8158  }
8159  return false;
8160 }
8161 
8162 inline bool
8163 Server::process_request(Stream &strm, const std::string &remote_addr,
8164  int remote_port, const std::string &local_addr,
8165  int local_port, bool close_connection,
8166  bool &connection_closed,
8167  const std::function<void(Request &)> &setup_request) {
8168  std::array<char, 2048> buf{};
8169 
8170  detail::stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf.data(), buf.size());
8171 
8172  // Connection has been closed on client
8173  if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
8174 
8175  Request req;
8176 
8177  Response res;
8178  res.version = "HTTP/1.1";
8179  res.headers = default_headers_;
8180 
8181 #ifdef __APPLE__
8182  // Socket file descriptor exceeded FD_SETSIZE...
8183  if (strm.socket() >= FD_SETSIZE) {
8184  Headers dummy;
8185  detail::read_headers(strm, dummy);
8186  res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
8187  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8188  }
8189 #endif
8190 
8191  // Request line and headers
8192  if (!parse_request_line(line_reader.ptr(), req) ||
8193  !detail::read_headers(strm, req.headers)) {
8194  res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
8195  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8196  }
8197 
8198  // Check if the request URI doesn't exceed the limit
8199  if (req.target.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_REQUEST_URI_MAX_LENGTH) {
8200  Headers dummy;
8201  detail::read_headers(strm, dummy);
8202  res.status = StatusCode::UriTooLong_414;
8203  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8204  }
8205 
8206  if (req.get_header_value("Connection") == "close") {
8207  connection_closed = true;
8208  }
8209 
8210  if (req.version == "HTTP/1.0" &&
8211  req.get_header_value("Connection") != "Keep-Alive") {
8212  connection_closed = true;
8213  }
8214 
8215  req.remote_addr = remote_addr;
8216  req.remote_port = remote_port;
8217  req.set_header("REMOTE_ADDR", req.remote_addr);
8218  req.set_header("REMOTE_PORT", std::to_string(req.remote_port));
8219 
8220  req.local_addr = local_addr;
8221  req.local_port = local_port;
8222  req.set_header("LOCAL_ADDR", req.local_addr);
8223  req.set_header("LOCAL_PORT", std::to_string(req.local_port));
8224 
8225  if (req.has_header("Accept")) {
8226  const auto &accept_header = req.get_header_value("Accept");
8227  if (!detail::parse_accept_header(accept_header, req.accept_content_types)) {
8228  res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
8229  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8230  }
8231  }
8232 
8233  if (req.has_header("Range")) {
8234  const auto &range_header_value = req.get_header_value("Range");
8235  if (!detail::parse_range_header(range_header_value, req.ranges)) {
8236  res.status = StatusCode::RangeNotSatisfiable_416;
8237  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8238  }
8239  }
8240 
8241  if (setup_request) { setup_request(req); }
8242 
8243  if (req.get_header_value("Expect") == "100-continue") {
8244  int status = StatusCode::Continue_100;
8245  if (expect_100_continue_handler_) {
8246  status = expect_100_continue_handler_(req, res);
8247  }
8248  switch (status) {
8249  case StatusCode::Continue_100:
8250  case StatusCode::ExpectationFailed_417:
8251  detail::write_response_line(strm, status);
8252  strm.write("\r\n");
8253  break;
8254  default:
8255  connection_closed = true;
8256  return write_response(strm, true, req, res);
8257  }
8258  }
8259 
8260  // Setup `is_connection_closed` method
8261  auto sock = strm.socket();
8262  req.is_connection_closed = [sock]() {
8263  return !detail::is_socket_alive(sock);
8264  };
8265 
8266  // Routing
8267  auto routed = false;
8268 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
8269  routed = routing(req, res, strm);
8270 #else
8271  try {
8272  routed = routing(req, res, strm);
8273  } catch (std::exception &e) {
8274  if (exception_handler_) {
8275  auto ep = std::current_exception();
8276  exception_handler_(req, res, ep);
8277  routed = true;
8278  } else {
8279  res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
8280  std::string val;
8281  auto s = e.what();
8282  for (size_t i = 0; s[i]; i++) {
8283  switch (s[i]) {
8284  case '\r': val += "\\r"; break;
8285  case '\n': val += "\\n"; break;
8286  default: val += s[i]; break;
8287  }
8288  }
8289  res.set_header("EXCEPTION_WHAT", val);
8290  }
8291  } catch (...) {
8292  if (exception_handler_) {
8293  auto ep = std::current_exception();
8294  exception_handler_(req, res, ep);
8295  routed = true;
8296  } else {
8297  res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
8298  res.set_header("EXCEPTION_WHAT", "UNKNOWN");
8299  }
8300  }
8301 #endif
8302  if (routed) {
8303  if (res.status == -1) {
8304  res.status = req.ranges.empty() ? StatusCode::OK_200
8305  : StatusCode::PartialContent_206;
8306  }
8307 
8308  // Serve file content by using a content provider
8309  if (!res.file_content_path_.empty()) {
8310  const auto &path = res.file_content_path_;
8311  auto mm = std::make_shared<detail::mmap>(path.c_str());
8312  if (!mm->is_open()) {
8313  res.body.clear();
8314  res.content_length_ = 0;
8315  res.content_provider_ = nullptr;
8316  res.status = StatusCode::NotFound_404;
8317  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8318  }
8319 
8320  auto content_type = res.file_content_content_type_;
8321  if (content_type.empty()) {
8322  content_type = detail::find_content_type(
8323  path, file_extension_and_mimetype_map_, default_file_mimetype_);
8324  }
8325 
8326  res.set_content_provider(
8327  mm->size(), content_type,
8328  [mm](size_t offset, size_t length, DataSink &sink) -> bool {
8329  sink.write(mm->data() + offset, length);
8330  return true;
8331  });
8332  }
8333 
8334  if (detail::range_error(req, res)) {
8335  res.body.clear();
8336  res.content_length_ = 0;
8337  res.content_provider_ = nullptr;
8338  res.status = StatusCode::RangeNotSatisfiable_416;
8339  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8340  }
8341 
8342  return write_response_with_content(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8343  } else {
8344  if (res.status == -1) { res.status = StatusCode::NotFound_404; }
8345 
8346  return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
8347  }
8348 }
8349 
8350 inline bool Server::is_valid() const { return true; }
8351 
8352 inline bool Server::process_and_close_socket(socket_t sock) {
8353  std::string remote_addr;
8354  int remote_port = 0;
8355  detail::get_remote_ip_and_port(sock, remote_addr, remote_port);
8356 
8357  std::string local_addr;
8358  int local_port = 0;
8359  detail::get_local_ip_and_port(sock, local_addr, local_port);
8360 
8361  auto ret = detail::process_server_socket(
8362  svr_sock_, sock, keep_alive_max_count_, keep_alive_timeout_sec_,
8363  read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
8364  write_timeout_usec_,
8365  [&](Stream &strm, bool close_connection, bool &connection_closed) {
8366  return process_request(strm, remote_addr, remote_port, local_addr,
8367  local_port, close_connection, connection_closed,
8368  nullptr);
8369  });
8370 
8371  detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
8372  detail::close_socket(sock);
8373  return ret;
8374 }
8375 
8376 // HTTP client implementation
8377 inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host)
8378  : ClientImpl(host, 80, std::string(), std::string()) {}
8379 
8380 inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port)
8381  : ClientImpl(host, port, std::string(), std::string()) {}
8382 
8383 inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port,
8384  const std::string &client_cert_path,
8385  const std::string &client_key_path)
8386  : host_(detail::escape_abstract_namespace_unix_domain(host)), port_(port),
8387  host_and_port_(adjust_host_string(host_) + ":" + std::to_string(port)),
8388  client_cert_path_(client_cert_path), client_key_path_(client_key_path) {}
8389 
8390 inline ClientImpl::~ClientImpl() {
8391  // Wait until all the requests in flight are handled.
8392  size_t retry_count = 10;
8393  while (retry_count-- > 0) {
8394  {
8395  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
8396  if (socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0) { break; }
8397  }
8398  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds{1});
8399  }
8400 
8401  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
8402  shutdown_socket(socket_);
8403  close_socket(socket_);
8404 }
8405 
8406 inline bool ClientImpl::is_valid() const { return true; }
8407 
8408 inline void ClientImpl::copy_settings(const ClientImpl &rhs) {
8409  client_cert_path_ = rhs.client_cert_path_;
8410  client_key_path_ = rhs.client_key_path_;
8411  connection_timeout_sec_ = rhs.connection_timeout_sec_;
8412  read_timeout_sec_ = rhs.read_timeout_sec_;
8413  read_timeout_usec_ = rhs.read_timeout_usec_;
8414  write_timeout_sec_ = rhs.write_timeout_sec_;
8415  write_timeout_usec_ = rhs.write_timeout_usec_;
8416  max_timeout_msec_ = rhs.max_timeout_msec_;
8417  basic_auth_username_ = rhs.basic_auth_username_;
8418  basic_auth_password_ = rhs.basic_auth_password_;
8419  bearer_token_auth_token_ = rhs.bearer_token_auth_token_;
8420 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8421  digest_auth_username_ = rhs.digest_auth_username_;
8422  digest_auth_password_ = rhs.digest_auth_password_;
8423 #endif
8424  keep_alive_ = rhs.keep_alive_;
8425  follow_location_ = rhs.follow_location_;
8426  path_encode_ = rhs.path_encode_;
8427  address_family_ = rhs.address_family_;
8428  tcp_nodelay_ = rhs.tcp_nodelay_;
8429  ipv6_v6only_ = rhs.ipv6_v6only_;
8430  socket_options_ = rhs.socket_options_;
8431  compress_ = rhs.compress_;
8432  decompress_ = rhs.decompress_;
8433  interface_ = rhs.interface_;
8434  proxy_host_ = rhs.proxy_host_;
8435  proxy_port_ = rhs.proxy_port_;
8436  proxy_basic_auth_username_ = rhs.proxy_basic_auth_username_;
8437  proxy_basic_auth_password_ = rhs.proxy_basic_auth_password_;
8438  proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_ = rhs.proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_;
8439 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8440  proxy_digest_auth_username_ = rhs.proxy_digest_auth_username_;
8441  proxy_digest_auth_password_ = rhs.proxy_digest_auth_password_;
8442 #endif
8443 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8444  ca_cert_file_path_ = rhs.ca_cert_file_path_;
8445  ca_cert_dir_path_ = rhs.ca_cert_dir_path_;
8446  ca_cert_store_ = rhs.ca_cert_store_;
8447 #endif
8448 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8449  server_certificate_verification_ = rhs.server_certificate_verification_;
8450  server_hostname_verification_ = rhs.server_hostname_verification_;
8451  server_certificate_verifier_ = rhs.server_certificate_verifier_;
8452 #endif
8453  logger_ = rhs.logger_;
8454 }
8455 
8456 inline socket_t ClientImpl::create_client_socket(Error &error) const {
8457  if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
8458  return detail::create_client_socket(
8459  proxy_host_, std::string(), proxy_port_, address_family_, tcp_nodelay_,
8460  ipv6_v6only_, socket_options_, connection_timeout_sec_,
8461  connection_timeout_usec_, read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_,
8462  write_timeout_sec_, write_timeout_usec_, interface_, error);
8463  }
8464 
8465  // Check is custom IP specified for host_
8466  std::string ip;
8467  auto it = addr_map_.find(host_);
8468  if (it != addr_map_.end()) { ip = it->second; }
8469 
8470  return detail::create_client_socket(
8471  host_, ip, port_, address_family_, tcp_nodelay_, ipv6_v6only_,
8472  socket_options_, connection_timeout_sec_, connection_timeout_usec_,
8473  read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
8474  write_timeout_usec_, interface_, error);
8475 }
8476 
8477 inline bool ClientImpl::create_and_connect_socket(Socket &socket,
8478  Error &error) {
8479  auto sock = create_client_socket(error);
8480  if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return false; }
8481  socket.sock = sock;
8482  return true;
8483 }
8484 
8485 inline void ClientImpl::shutdown_ssl(Socket & /*socket*/,
8486  bool /*shutdown_gracefully*/) {
8487  // If there are any requests in flight from threads other than us, then it's
8488  // a thread-unsafe race because individual ssl* objects are not thread-safe.
8489  assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0 ||
8490  socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
8491 }
8492 
8493 inline void ClientImpl::shutdown_socket(Socket &socket) const {
8494  if (socket.sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return; }
8495  detail::shutdown_socket(socket.sock);
8496 }
8497 
8498 inline void ClientImpl::close_socket(Socket &socket) {
8499  // If there are requests in flight in another thread, usually closing
8500  // the socket will be fine and they will simply receive an error when
8501  // using the closed socket, but it is still a bug since rarely the OS
8502  // may reassign the socket id to be used for a new socket, and then
8503  // suddenly they will be operating on a live socket that is different
8504  // than the one they intended!
8505  assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0 ||
8506  socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
8507 
8508  // It is also a bug if this happens while SSL is still active
8509 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8510  assert(socket.ssl == nullptr);
8511 #endif
8512  if (socket.sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return; }
8513  detail::close_socket(socket.sock);
8514  socket.sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
8515 }
8516 
8517 inline bool ClientImpl::read_response_line(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
8518  Response &res) const {
8519  std::array<char, 2048> buf{};
8520 
8521  detail::stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf.data(), buf.size());
8522 
8523  if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
8524 
8525 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ALLOW_LF_AS_LINE_TERMINATOR
8526  thread_local const std::regex re("(HTTP/1\\.[01]) (\\d{3})(?: (.*?))?\r?\n");
8527 #else
8528  thread_local const std::regex re("(HTTP/1\\.[01]) (\\d{3})(?: (.*?))?\r\n");
8529 #endif
8530 
8531  std::cmatch m;
8532  if (!std::regex_match(line_reader.ptr(), m, re)) {
8533  return req.method == "CONNECT";
8534  }
8535  res.version = std::string(m[1]);
8536  res.status = std::stoi(std::string(m[2]));
8537  res.reason = std::string(m[3]);
8538 
8539  // Ignore '100 Continue'
8540  while (res.status == StatusCode::Continue_100) {
8541  if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; } // CRLF
8542  if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; } // next response line
8543 
8544  if (!std::regex_match(line_reader.ptr(), m, re)) { return false; }
8545  res.version = std::string(m[1]);
8546  res.status = std::stoi(std::string(m[2]));
8547  res.reason = std::string(m[3]);
8548  }
8549 
8550  return true;
8551 }
8552 
8553 inline bool ClientImpl::send(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
8554  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> request_mutex_guard(request_mutex_);
8555  auto ret = send_(req, res, error);
8556  if (error == Error::SSLPeerCouldBeClosed_) {
8557  assert(!ret);
8558  ret = send_(req, res, error);
8559  }
8560  return ret;
8561 }
8562 
8563 inline bool ClientImpl::send_(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
8564  {
8565  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
8566 
8567  // Set this to false immediately - if it ever gets set to true by the end of
8568  // the request, we know another thread instructed us to close the socket.
8569  socket_should_be_closed_when_request_is_done_ = false;
8570 
8571  auto is_alive = false;
8572  if (socket_.is_open()) {
8573  is_alive = detail::is_socket_alive(socket_.sock);
8574 
8575 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8576  if (is_alive && is_ssl()) {
8577  if (detail::is_ssl_peer_could_be_closed(socket_.ssl, socket_.sock)) {
8578  is_alive = false;
8579  }
8580  }
8581 #endif
8582 
8583  if (!is_alive) {
8584  // Attempt to avoid sigpipe by shutting down non-gracefully if it seems
8585  // like the other side has already closed the connection Also, there
8586  // cannot be any requests in flight from other threads since we locked
8587  // request_mutex_, so safe to close everything immediately
8588  const bool shutdown_gracefully = false;
8589  shutdown_ssl(socket_, shutdown_gracefully);
8590  shutdown_socket(socket_);
8591  close_socket(socket_);
8592  }
8593  }
8594 
8595  if (!is_alive) {
8596  if (!create_and_connect_socket(socket_, error)) { return false; }
8597 
8598 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8599  // TODO: refactoring
8600  if (is_ssl()) {
8601  auto &scli = static_cast<SSLClient &>(*this);
8602  if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
8603  auto success = false;
8604  if (!scli.connect_with_proxy(socket_, req.start_time_, res, success,
8605  error)) {
8606  return success;
8607  }
8608  }
8609 
8610  if (!scli.initialize_ssl(socket_, error)) { return false; }
8611  }
8612 #endif
8613  }
8614 
8615  // Mark the current socket as being in use so that it cannot be closed by
8616  // anyone else while this request is ongoing, even though we will be
8617  // releasing the mutex.
8618  if (socket_requests_in_flight_ > 1) {
8619  assert(socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
8620  }
8621  socket_requests_in_flight_ += 1;
8622  socket_requests_are_from_thread_ = std::this_thread::get_id();
8623  }
8624 
8625  for (const auto &header : default_headers_) {
8626  if (req.headers.find(header.first) == req.headers.end()) {
8627  req.headers.insert(header);
8628  }
8629  }
8630 
8631  auto ret = false;
8632  auto close_connection = !keep_alive_;
8633 
8634  auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() {
8635  // Briefly lock mutex in order to mark that a request is no longer ongoing
8636  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
8637  socket_requests_in_flight_ -= 1;
8638  if (socket_requests_in_flight_ <= 0) {
8639  assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0);
8640  socket_requests_are_from_thread_ = std::thread::id();
8641  }
8642 
8643  if (socket_should_be_closed_when_request_is_done_ || close_connection ||
8644  !ret) {
8645  shutdown_ssl(socket_, true);
8646  shutdown_socket(socket_);
8647  close_socket(socket_);
8648  }
8649  });
8650 
8651  ret = process_socket(socket_, req.start_time_, [&](Stream &strm) {
8652  return handle_request(strm, req, res, close_connection, error);
8653  });
8654 
8655  if (!ret) {
8656  if (error == Error::Success) { error = Error::Unknown; }
8657  }
8658 
8659  return ret;
8660 }
8661 
8662 inline Result ClientImpl::send(const Request &req) {
8663  auto req2 = req;
8664  return send_(std::move(req2));
8665 }
8666 
8667 inline Result ClientImpl::send_(Request &&req) {
8668  auto res = detail::make_unique<Response>();
8669  auto error = Error::Success;
8670  auto ret = send(req, *res, error);
8671 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8672  return Result{ret ? std::move(res) : nullptr, error, std::move(req.headers),
8673  last_ssl_error_, last_openssl_error_};
8674 #else
8675  return Result{ret ? std::move(res) : nullptr, error, std::move(req.headers)};
8676 #endif
8677 }
8678 
8679 inline bool ClientImpl::handle_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
8680  Response &res, bool close_connection,
8681  Error &error) {
8682  if (req.path.empty()) {
8683  error = Error::Connection;
8684  return false;
8685  }
8686 
8687  auto req_save = req;
8688 
8689  bool ret;
8690 
8691  if (!is_ssl() && !proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
8692  auto req2 = req;
8693  req2.path = "http://" + host_and_port_ + req.path;
8694  ret = process_request(strm, req2, res, close_connection, error);
8695  req = req2;
8696  req.path = req_save.path;
8697  } else {
8698  ret = process_request(strm, req, res, close_connection, error);
8699  }
8700 
8701  if (!ret) { return false; }
8702 
8703  if (res.get_header_value("Connection") == "close" ||
8704  (res.version == "HTTP/1.0" && res.reason != "Connection established")) {
8705  // TODO this requires a not-entirely-obvious chain of calls to be correct
8706  // for this to be safe.
8707 
8708  // This is safe to call because handle_request is only called by send_
8709  // which locks the request mutex during the process. It would be a bug
8710  // to call it from a different thread since it's a thread-safety issue
8711  // to do these things to the socket if another thread is using the socket.
8712  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
8713  shutdown_ssl(socket_, true);
8714  shutdown_socket(socket_);
8715  close_socket(socket_);
8716  }
8717 
8718  if (300 < res.status && res.status < 400 && follow_location_) {
8719  req = req_save;
8720  ret = redirect(req, res, error);
8721  }
8722 
8723 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8724  if ((res.status == StatusCode::Unauthorized_401 ||
8725  res.status == StatusCode::ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407) &&
8726  req.authorization_count_ < 5) {
8727  auto is_proxy = res.status == StatusCode::ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407;
8728  const auto &username =
8729  is_proxy ? proxy_digest_auth_username_ : digest_auth_username_;
8730  const auto &password =
8731  is_proxy ? proxy_digest_auth_password_ : digest_auth_password_;
8732 
8733  if (!username.empty() && !password.empty()) {
8734  std::map<std::string, std::string> auth;
8735  if (detail::parse_www_authenticate(res, auth, is_proxy)) {
8736  Request new_req = req;
8737  new_req.authorization_count_ += 1;
8738  new_req.headers.erase(is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authorization"
8739  : "Authorization");
8740  new_req.headers.insert(detail::make_digest_authentication_header(
8741  req, auth, new_req.authorization_count_, detail::random_string(10),
8742  username, password, is_proxy));
8743 
8744  Response new_res;
8745 
8746  ret = send(new_req, new_res, error);
8747  if (ret) { res = new_res; }
8748  }
8749  }
8750  }
8751 #endif
8752 
8753  return ret;
8754 }
8755 
8756 inline bool ClientImpl::redirect(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
8757  if (req.redirect_count_ == 0) {
8758  error = Error::ExceedRedirectCount;
8759  return false;
8760  }
8761 
8762  auto location = res.get_header_value("location");
8763  if (location.empty()) { return false; }
8764 
8765  thread_local const std::regex re(
8766  R"((?:(https?):)?(?://(?:\[([a-fA-F\d:]+)\]|([^:/?#]+))(?::(\d+))?)?([^?#]*)(\?[^#]*)?(?:#.*)?)");
8767 
8768  std::smatch m;
8769  if (!std::regex_match(location, m, re)) { return false; }
8770 
8771  auto scheme = is_ssl() ? "https" : "http";
8772 
8773  auto next_scheme = m[1].str();
8774  auto next_host = m[2].str();
8775  if (next_host.empty()) { next_host = m[3].str(); }
8776  auto port_str = m[4].str();
8777  auto next_path = m[5].str();
8778  auto next_query = m[6].str();
8779 
8780  auto next_port = port_;
8781  if (!port_str.empty()) {
8782  next_port = std::stoi(port_str);
8783  } else if (!next_scheme.empty()) {
8784  next_port = next_scheme == "https" ? 443 : 80;
8785  }
8786 
8787  if (next_scheme.empty()) { next_scheme = scheme; }
8788  if (next_host.empty()) { next_host = host_; }
8789  if (next_path.empty()) { next_path = "/"; }
8790 
8791  auto path = decode_query_component(next_path, true) + next_query;
8792 
8793  // Same host redirect - use current client
8794  if (next_scheme == scheme && next_host == host_ && next_port == port_) {
8795  return detail::redirect(*this, req, res, path, location, error);
8796  }
8797 
8798  // Cross-host/scheme redirect - create new client with robust setup
8799  return create_redirect_client(next_scheme, next_host, next_port, req, res,
8800  path, location, error);
8801 }
8802 
8803 // New method for robust redirect client creation
8804 inline bool ClientImpl::create_redirect_client(
8805  const std::string &scheme, const std::string &host, int port, Request &req,
8806  Response &res, const std::string &path, const std::string &location,
8807  Error &error) {
8808  // Determine if we need SSL
8809  auto need_ssl = (scheme == "https");
8810 
8811  // Clean up request headers that are host/client specific
8812  // Remove headers that should not be carried over to new host
8813  auto headers_to_remove =
8814  std::vector<std::string>{"Host", "Proxy-Authorization", "Authorization"};
8815 
8816  for (const auto &header_name : headers_to_remove) {
8817  auto it = req.headers.find(header_name);
8818  while (it != req.headers.end()) {
8819  it = req.headers.erase(it);
8820  it = req.headers.find(header_name);
8821  }
8822  }
8823 
8824  // Create appropriate client type and handle redirect
8825  if (need_ssl) {
8826 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8827  // Create SSL client for HTTPS redirect
8828  SSLClient redirect_client(host, port);
8829 
8830  // Setup basic client configuration first
8831  setup_redirect_client(redirect_client);
8832 
8833  // SSL-specific configuration for proxy environments
8834  if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
8835  // Critical: Disable SSL verification for proxy environments
8836  redirect_client.enable_server_certificate_verification(false);
8837  redirect_client.enable_server_hostname_verification(false);
8838  } else {
8839  // For direct SSL connections, copy SSL verification settings
8840  redirect_client.enable_server_certificate_verification(
8841  server_certificate_verification_);
8842  redirect_client.enable_server_hostname_verification(
8843  server_hostname_verification_);
8844  }
8845 
8846  // Handle CA certificate store and paths if available
8847  if (ca_cert_store_) { redirect_client.set_ca_cert_store(ca_cert_store_); }
8848  if (!ca_cert_file_path_.empty()) {
8849  redirect_client.set_ca_cert_path(ca_cert_file_path_, ca_cert_dir_path_);
8850  }
8851 
8852  // Client certificates are set through constructor for SSLClient
8853  // NOTE: SSLClient constructor already takes client_cert_path and
8854  // client_key_path so we need to create it properly if client certs are
8855  // needed
8856 
8857  // Execute the redirect
8858  return detail::redirect(redirect_client, req, res, path, location, error);
8859 #else
8860  // SSL not supported - set appropriate error
8861  error = Error::SSLConnection;
8862  return false;
8863 #endif
8864  } else {
8865  // HTTP redirect
8866  ClientImpl redirect_client(host, port);
8867 
8868  // Setup client with robust configuration
8869  setup_redirect_client(redirect_client);
8870 
8871  // Execute the redirect
8872  return detail::redirect(redirect_client, req, res, path, location, error);
8873  }
8874 }
8875 
8876 // New method for robust client setup (based on basic_manual_redirect.cpp logic)
8877 template <typename ClientType>
8878 inline void ClientImpl::setup_redirect_client(ClientType &client) {
8879  // Copy basic settings first
8880  client.set_connection_timeout(connection_timeout_sec_);
8881  client.set_read_timeout(read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_);
8882  client.set_write_timeout(write_timeout_sec_, write_timeout_usec_);
8883  client.set_keep_alive(keep_alive_);
8884  client.set_follow_location(
8885  true); // Enable redirects to handle multi-step redirects
8886  client.set_path_encode(path_encode_);
8887  client.set_compress(compress_);
8888  client.set_decompress(decompress_);
8889 
8890  // Copy authentication settings BEFORE proxy setup
8891  if (!basic_auth_username_.empty()) {
8892  client.set_basic_auth(basic_auth_username_, basic_auth_password_);
8893  }
8894  if (!bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
8895  client.set_bearer_token_auth(bearer_token_auth_token_);
8896  }
8897 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8898  if (!digest_auth_username_.empty()) {
8899  client.set_digest_auth(digest_auth_username_, digest_auth_password_);
8900  }
8901 #endif
8902 
8903  // Setup proxy configuration (CRITICAL ORDER - proxy must be set
8904  // before proxy auth)
8905  if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
8906  // First set proxy host and port
8907  client.set_proxy(proxy_host_, proxy_port_);
8908 
8909  // Then set proxy authentication (order matters!)
8910  if (!proxy_basic_auth_username_.empty()) {
8911  client.set_proxy_basic_auth(proxy_basic_auth_username_,
8912  proxy_basic_auth_password_);
8913  }
8914  if (!proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
8915  client.set_proxy_bearer_token_auth(proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_);
8916  }
8917 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
8918  if (!proxy_digest_auth_username_.empty()) {
8919  client.set_proxy_digest_auth(proxy_digest_auth_username_,
8920  proxy_digest_auth_password_);
8921  }
8922 #endif
8923  }
8924 
8925  // Copy network and socket settings
8926  client.set_address_family(address_family_);
8927  client.set_tcp_nodelay(tcp_nodelay_);
8928  client.set_ipv6_v6only(ipv6_v6only_);
8929  if (socket_options_) { client.set_socket_options(socket_options_); }
8930  if (!interface_.empty()) { client.set_interface(interface_); }
8931 
8932  // Copy logging and headers
8933  if (logger_) { client.set_logger(logger_); }
8934 
8935  // NOTE: DO NOT copy default_headers_ as they may contain stale Host headers
8936  // Each new client should generate its own headers based on its target host
8937 }
8938 
8939 inline bool ClientImpl::write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm,
8940  const Request &req,
8941  Error &error) const {
8942  auto is_shutting_down = []() { return false; };
8943 
8944  if (req.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
8945  // TODO: Brotli support
8946  std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
8947 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
8948  if (compress_) {
8949  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
8950  } else
8951 #endif
8952  {
8953  compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::nocompressor>();
8954  }
8955 
8956  return detail::write_content_chunked(strm, req.content_provider_,
8957  is_shutting_down, *compressor, error);
8958  } else {
8959  return detail::write_content_with_progress(
8960  strm, req.content_provider_, 0, req.content_length_, is_shutting_down,
8961  req.upload_progress, error);
8962  }
8963 }
8964 
8965 inline bool ClientImpl::write_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
8966  bool close_connection, Error &error) {
8967  // Prepare additional headers
8968  if (close_connection) {
8969  if (!req.has_header("Connection")) {
8970  req.set_header("Connection", "close");
8971  }
8972  }
8973 
8974  if (!req.has_header("Host")) {
8975  // For Unix socket connections, use "localhost" as Host header (similar to
8976  // curl behavior)
8977  if (address_family_ == AF_UNIX) {
8978  req.set_header("Host", "localhost");
8979  } else if (is_ssl()) {
8980  if (port_ == 443) {
8981  req.set_header("Host", host_);
8982  } else {
8983  req.set_header("Host", host_and_port_);
8984  }
8985  } else {
8986  if (port_ == 80) {
8987  req.set_header("Host", host_);
8988  } else {
8989  req.set_header("Host", host_and_port_);
8990  }
8991  }
8992  }
8993 
8994  if (!req.has_header("Accept")) { req.set_header("Accept", "*/*"); }
8995 
8996  if (!req.content_receiver) {
8997  if (!req.has_header("Accept-Encoding")) {
8998  std::string accept_encoding;
8999 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
9000  accept_encoding = "br";
9001 #endif
9002 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
9003  if (!accept_encoding.empty()) { accept_encoding += ", "; }
9004  accept_encoding += "gzip, deflate";
9005 #endif
9006 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZSTD_SUPPORT
9007  if (!accept_encoding.empty()) { accept_encoding += ", "; }
9008  accept_encoding += "zstd";
9009 #endif
9010  req.set_header("Accept-Encoding", accept_encoding);
9011  }
9012 
9013 #ifndef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_DEFAULT_USER_AGENT
9014  if (!req.has_header("User-Agent")) {
9015  auto agent = std::string("cpp-httplib/") + CPPHTTPLIB_VERSION;
9016  req.set_header("User-Agent", agent);
9017  }
9018 #endif
9019  };
9020 
9021  if (req.body.empty()) {
9022  if (req.content_provider_) {
9023  if (!req.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
9024  if (!req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
9025  auto length = std::to_string(req.content_length_);
9026  req.set_header("Content-Length", length);
9027  }
9028  }
9029  } else {
9030  if (req.method == "POST" || req.method == "PUT" ||
9031  req.method == "PATCH") {
9032  req.set_header("Content-Length", "0");
9033  }
9034  }
9035  } else {
9036  if (!req.has_header("Content-Type")) {
9037  req.set_header("Content-Type", "text/plain");
9038  }
9039 
9040  if (!req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
9041  auto length = std::to_string(req.body.size());
9042  req.set_header("Content-Length", length);
9043  }
9044  }
9045 
9046  if (!basic_auth_password_.empty() || !basic_auth_username_.empty()) {
9047  if (!req.has_header("Authorization")) {
9048  req.headers.insert(make_basic_authentication_header(
9049  basic_auth_username_, basic_auth_password_, false));
9050  }
9051  }
9052 
9053  if (!proxy_basic_auth_username_.empty() &&
9054  !proxy_basic_auth_password_.empty()) {
9055  if (!req.has_header("Proxy-Authorization")) {
9056  req.headers.insert(make_basic_authentication_header(
9057  proxy_basic_auth_username_, proxy_basic_auth_password_, true));
9058  }
9059  }
9060 
9061  if (!bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
9062  if (!req.has_header("Authorization")) {
9063  req.headers.insert(make_bearer_token_authentication_header(
9064  bearer_token_auth_token_, false));
9065  }
9066  }
9067 
9068  if (!proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
9069  if (!req.has_header("Proxy-Authorization")) {
9070  req.headers.insert(make_bearer_token_authentication_header(
9071  proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_, true));
9072  }
9073  }
9074 
9075  // Request line and headers
9076  {
9077  detail::BufferStream bstrm;
9078 
9079  // Extract path and query from req.path
9080  std::string path_part, query_part;
9081  auto query_pos = req.path.find('?');
9082  if (query_pos != std::string::npos) {
9083  path_part = req.path.substr(0, query_pos);
9084  query_part = req.path.substr(query_pos + 1);
9085  } else {
9086  path_part = req.path;
9087  query_part = "";
9088  }
9089 
9090  // Encode path and query
9091  auto path_with_query =
9092  path_encode_ ? detail::encode_path(path_part) : path_part;
9093 
9094  detail::parse_query_text(query_part, req.params);
9095  if (!req.params.empty()) {
9096  path_with_query = append_query_params(path_with_query, req.params);
9097  }
9098 
9099  // Write request line and headers
9100  detail::write_request_line(bstrm, req.method, path_with_query);
9101  header_writer_(bstrm, req.headers);
9102 
9103  // Flush buffer
9104  auto &data = bstrm.get_buffer();
9105  if (!detail::write_data(strm, data.data(), data.size())) {
9106  error = Error::Write;
9107  return false;
9108  }
9109  }
9110 
9111  // Body
9112  if (req.body.empty()) {
9113  return write_content_with_provider(strm, req, error);
9114  }
9115 
9116  if (req.upload_progress) {
9117  auto body_size = req.body.size();
9118  size_t written = 0;
9119  auto data = req.body.data();
9120 
9121  while (written < body_size) {
9122  size_t to_write = (std::min)(CPPHTTPLIB_SEND_BUFSIZ, body_size - written);
9123  if (!detail::write_data(strm, data + written, to_write)) {
9124  error = Error::Write;
9125  return false;
9126  }
9127  written += to_write;
9128 
9129  if (!req.upload_progress(written, body_size)) {
9130  error = Error::Canceled;
9131  return false;
9132  }
9133  }
9134  } else {
9135  if (!detail::write_data(strm, req.body.data(), req.body.size())) {
9136  error = Error::Write;
9137  return false;
9138  }
9139  }
9140 
9141  return true;
9142 }
9143 
9144 inline std::unique_ptr<Response> ClientImpl::send_with_content_provider(
9145  Request &req, const char *body, size_t content_length,
9146  ContentProvider content_provider,
9147  ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
9148  const std::string &content_type, Error &error) {
9149  if (!content_type.empty()) { req.set_header("Content-Type", content_type); }
9150 
9151 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
9152  if (compress_) { req.set_header("Content-Encoding", "gzip"); }
9153 #endif
9154 
9155 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
9156  if (compress_ && !content_provider_without_length) {
9157  // TODO: Brotli support
9158  detail::gzip_compressor compressor;
9159 
9160  if (content_provider) {
9161  auto ok = true;
9162  size_t offset = 0;
9163  DataSink data_sink;
9164 
9165  data_sink.write = [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) -> bool {
9166  if (ok) {
9167  auto last = offset + data_len == content_length;
9168 
9169  auto ret = compressor.compress(
9170  data, data_len, last,
9171  [&](const char *compressed_data, size_t compressed_data_len) {
9172  req.body.append(compressed_data, compressed_data_len);
9173  return true;
9174  });
9175 
9176  if (ret) {
9177  offset += data_len;
9178  } else {
9179  ok = false;
9180  }
9181  }
9182  return ok;
9183  };
9184 
9185  while (ok && offset < content_length) {
9186  if (!content_provider(offset, content_length - offset, data_sink)) {
9187  error = Error::Canceled;
9188  return nullptr;
9189  }
9190  }
9191  } else {
9192  if (!compressor.compress(body, content_length, true,
9193  [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
9194  req.body.append(data, data_len);
9195  return true;
9196  })) {
9197  error = Error::Compression;
9198  return nullptr;
9199  }
9200  }
9201  } else
9202 #endif
9203  {
9204  if (content_provider) {
9205  req.content_length_ = content_length;
9206  req.content_provider_ = std::move(content_provider);
9207  req.is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
9208  } else if (content_provider_without_length) {
9209  req.content_length_ = 0;
9210  req.content_provider_ = detail::ContentProviderAdapter(
9211  std::move(content_provider_without_length));
9212  req.is_chunked_content_provider_ = true;
9213  req.set_header("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked");
9214  } else {
9215  req.body.assign(body, content_length);
9216  }
9217  }
9218 
9219  auto res = detail::make_unique<Response>();
9220  return send(req, *res, error) ? std::move(res) : nullptr;
9221 }
9222 
9223 inline Result ClientImpl::send_with_content_provider(
9224  const std::string &method, const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9225  const char *body, size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
9226  ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
9227  const std::string &content_type, UploadProgress progress) {
9228  Request req;
9229  req.method = method;
9230  req.headers = headers;
9231  req.path = path;
9232  req.upload_progress = std::move(progress);
9233  if (max_timeout_msec_ > 0) {
9234  req.start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
9235  }
9236 
9237  auto error = Error::Success;
9238 
9239  auto res = send_with_content_provider(
9240  req, body, content_length, std::move(content_provider),
9241  std::move(content_provider_without_length), content_type, error);
9242 
9243 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
9244  return Result{std::move(res), error, std::move(req.headers), last_ssl_error_,
9245  last_openssl_error_};
9246 #else
9247  return Result{std::move(res), error, std::move(req.headers)};
9248 #endif
9249 }
9250 
9251 inline std::string
9252 ClientImpl::adjust_host_string(const std::string &host) const {
9253  if (host.find(':') != std::string::npos) { return "[" + host + "]"; }
9254  return host;
9255 }
9256 
9257 inline bool ClientImpl::process_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
9258  Response &res, bool close_connection,
9259  Error &error) {
9260  // Send request
9261  if (!write_request(strm, req, close_connection, error)) { return false; }
9262 
9263 #ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
9264  if (is_ssl()) {
9265  auto is_proxy_enabled = !proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1;
9266  if (!is_proxy_enabled) {
9267  if (detail::is_ssl_peer_could_be_closed(socket_.ssl, socket_.sock)) {
9268  error = Error::SSLPeerCouldBeClosed_;
9269  return false;
9270  }
9271  }
9272  }
9273 #endif
9274 
9275  // Receive response and headers
9276  if (!read_response_line(strm, req, res) ||
9277  !detail::read_headers(strm, res.headers)) {
9278  error = Error::Read;
9279  return false;
9280  }
9281 
9282  // Body
9283  if ((res.status != StatusCode::NoContent_204) && req.method != "HEAD" &&
9284  req.method != "CONNECT") {
9285  auto redirect = 300 < res.status && res.status < 400 &&
9286  res.status != StatusCode::NotModified_304 &&
9287  follow_location_;
9288 
9289  if (req.response_handler && !redirect) {
9290  if (!req.response_handler(res)) {
9291  error = Error::Canceled;
9292  return false;
9293  }
9294  }
9295 
9296  auto out =
9297  req.content_receiver
9298  ? static_cast<ContentReceiverWithProgress>(
9299  [&](const char *buf, size_t n, size_t off, size_t len) {
9300  if (redirect) { return true; }
9301  auto ret = req.content_receiver(buf, n, off, len);
9302  if (!ret) { error = Error::Canceled; }
9303  return ret;
9304  })
9305  : static_cast<ContentReceiverWithProgress>(
9306  [&](const char *buf, size_t n, size_t /*off*/,
9307  size_t /*len*/) {
9308  assert(res.body.size() + n <= res.body.max_size());
9309  res.body.append(buf, n);
9310  return true;
9311  });
9312 
9313  auto progress = [&](size_t current, size_t total) {
9314  if (!req.download_progress || redirect) { return true; }
9315  auto ret = req.download_progress(current, total);
9316  if (!ret) { error = Error::Canceled; }
9317  return ret;
9318  };
9319 
9320  if (res.has_header("Content-Length")) {
9321  if (!req.content_receiver) {
9322  auto len = res.get_header_value_u64("Content-Length");
9323  if (len > res.body.max_size()) {
9324  error = Error::Read;
9325  return false;
9326  }
9327  res.body.reserve(static_cast<size_t>(len));
9328  }
9329  }
9330 
9331  if (res.status != StatusCode::NotModified_304) {
9332  int dummy_status;
9333  if (!detail::read_content(strm, res, (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)(),
9334  dummy_status, std::move(progress),
9335  std::move(out), decompress_)) {
9336  if (error != Error::Canceled) { error = Error::Read; }
9337  return false;
9338  }
9339  }
9340  }
9341 
9342  // Log
9343  if (logger_) { logger_(req, res); }
9344 
9345  return true;
9346 }
9347 
9348 inline ContentProviderWithoutLength ClientImpl::get_multipart_content_provider(
9349  const std::string &boundary, const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9350  const FormDataProviderItems &provider_items) const {
9351  size_t cur_item = 0;
9352  size_t cur_start = 0;
9353  // cur_item and cur_start are copied to within the std::function and maintain
9354  // state between successive calls
9355  return [&, cur_item, cur_start](size_t offset,
9356  DataSink &sink) mutable -> bool {
9357  if (!offset && !items.empty()) {
9358  sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary, false);
9359  return true;
9360  } else if (cur_item < provider_items.size()) {
9361  if (!cur_start) {
9362  const auto &begin = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_item_begin(
9363  provider_items[cur_item], boundary);
9364  offset += begin.size();
9365  cur_start = offset;
9366  sink.os << begin;
9367  }
9368 
9369  DataSink cur_sink;
9370  auto has_data = true;
9371  cur_sink.write = sink.write;
9372  cur_sink.done = [&]() { has_data = false; };
9373 
9374  if (!provider_items[cur_item].provider(offset - cur_start, cur_sink)) {
9375  return false;
9376  }
9377 
9378  if (!has_data) {
9379  sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_item_end();
9380  cur_item++;
9381  cur_start = 0;
9382  }
9383  return true;
9384  } else {
9385  sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_finish(boundary);
9386  sink.done();
9387  return true;
9388  }
9389  };
9390 }
9391 
9392 inline bool ClientImpl::process_socket(
9393  const Socket &socket,
9394  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> start_time,
9395  std::function<bool(Stream &strm)> callback) {
9396  return detail::process_client_socket(
9397  socket.sock, read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
9398  write_timeout_usec_, max_timeout_msec_, start_time, std::move(callback));
9399 }
9400 
9401 inline bool ClientImpl::is_ssl() const { return false; }
9402 
9403 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
9404  DownloadProgress progress) {
9405  return Get(path, Headers(), std::move(progress));
9406 }
9407 
9408 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
9409  const Headers &headers,
9410  DownloadProgress progress) {
9411  if (params.empty()) { return Get(path, headers); }
9412 
9413  std::string path_with_query = append_query_params(path, params);
9414  return Get(path_with_query, headers, std::move(progress));
9415 }
9416 
9417 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9418  DownloadProgress progress) {
9419  Request req;
9420  req.method = "GET";
9421  req.path = path;
9422  req.headers = headers;
9423  req.download_progress = std::move(progress);
9424  if (max_timeout_msec_ > 0) {
9425  req.start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
9426  }
9427 
9428  return send_(std::move(req));
9429 }
9430 
9431 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
9432  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9433  DownloadProgress progress) {
9434  return Get(path, Headers(), nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
9435  std::move(progress));
9436 }
9437 
9438 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9439  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9440  DownloadProgress progress) {
9441  return Get(path, headers, nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
9442  std::move(progress));
9443 }
9444 
9445 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
9446  ResponseHandler response_handler,
9447  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9448  DownloadProgress progress) {
9449  return Get(path, Headers(), std::move(response_handler),
9450  std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
9451 }
9452 
9453 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9454  ResponseHandler response_handler,
9455  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9456  DownloadProgress progress) {
9457  Request req;
9458  req.method = "GET";
9459  req.path = path;
9460  req.headers = headers;
9461  req.response_handler = std::move(response_handler);
9462  req.content_receiver =
9463  [content_receiver](const char *data, size_t data_length,
9464  size_t /*offset*/, size_t /*total_length*/) {
9465  return content_receiver(data, data_length);
9466  };
9467  req.download_progress = std::move(progress);
9468  if (max_timeout_msec_ > 0) {
9469  req.start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
9470  }
9471 
9472  return send_(std::move(req));
9473 }
9474 
9475 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
9476  const Headers &headers,
9477  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9478  DownloadProgress progress) {
9479  return Get(path, params, headers, nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
9480  std::move(progress));
9481 }
9482 
9483 inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
9484  const Headers &headers,
9485  ResponseHandler response_handler,
9486  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9487  DownloadProgress progress) {
9488  if (params.empty()) {
9489  return Get(path, headers, std::move(response_handler),
9490  std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
9491  }
9492 
9493  std::string path_with_query = append_query_params(path, params);
9494  return Get(path_with_query, headers, std::move(response_handler),
9495  std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
9496 }

9498 inline Result ClientImpl::Head(const std::string &path) {
9499  return Head(path, Headers());
9500 }

9502 inline Result ClientImpl::Head(const std::string &path,
9503  const Headers &headers) {
9504  Request req;
9505  req.method = "HEAD";
9506  req.headers = headers;
9507  req.path = path;
9508  if (max_timeout_msec_ > 0) {
9509  req.start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
9510  }
9511 
9512  return send_(std::move(req));
9513 }

9520  const Headers &headers) {
9521  return Post(path, headers, nullptr, 0, std::string());
9522 }

9525  size_t content_length,
9526  const std::string &content_type,
9527  UploadProgress progress) {
9528  return Post(path, Headers(), body, content_length, content_type, progress);
9529 }

9532  const std::string &content_type,

9534  return Post(path, Headers(), body, content_type, progress);
9535 }

9539 }

9541 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, size_t content_length,
9542  ContentProvider content_provider,
9543  const std::string &content_type,
9544  UploadProgress progress) {

9546  content_type, progress);

9549 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path,
9550  ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
9551  const std::string &content_type,
9552  UploadProgress progress) {

9554  progress);
9555 }

9557 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9558  const Params &params) {
9559  auto query = detail::params_to_query_str(params);
9560  return Post(path, headers, query, "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
9561 }
9562 
9563 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path,
9564  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9565  UploadProgress progress) {
9566  return Post(path, Headers(), items, progress);
9567 }
9568 
9569 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9570  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9571  UploadProgress progress) {
9572  const auto &boundary = detail::make_multipart_data_boundary();
9573  const auto &content_type =
9574  detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(boundary);
9575  const auto &body = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary);
9576  return Post(path, headers, body, content_type, progress);
9577 }
9578 
9579 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9580  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9581  const std::string &boundary,
9582  UploadProgress progress) {
9583  if (!detail::is_multipart_boundary_chars_valid(boundary)) {
9584  return Result{nullptr, Error::UnsupportedMultipartBoundaryChars};
9585  }
9586 
9587  const auto &content_type =
9588  detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(boundary);
9589  const auto &body = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary);
9590  return Post(path, headers, body, content_type, progress);
9591 }
9592 
9593 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9594  const char *body, size_t content_length,
9595  const std::string &content_type,
9596  UploadProgress progress) {
9597  return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body, content_length,
9598  nullptr, nullptr, content_type, progress);
9599 }
9600 
9601 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9602  const std::string &body,
9603  const std::string &content_type,
9604  UploadProgress progress) {
9605  return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body.data(),
9606  body.size(), nullptr, nullptr, content_type,
9607  progress);
9608 }
9609 
9610 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9611  size_t content_length,
9612  ContentProvider content_provider,
9613  const std::string &content_type,
9614  UploadProgress progress) {
9615  return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, nullptr,
9616  content_length, std::move(content_provider),
9617  nullptr, content_type, progress);
9618 }
9619 
9620 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9621  ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
9622  const std::string &content_type,
9623  UploadProgress progress) {
9624  return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, nullptr, 0, nullptr,
9625  std::move(content_provider), content_type,
9626  progress);
9627 }
9628 
9629 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9630  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9631  const FormDataProviderItems &provider_items,
9632  UploadProgress progress) {
9633  const auto &boundary = detail::make_multipart_data_boundary();
9634  const auto &content_type =
9635  detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(boundary);
9636  return send_with_content_provider(
9637  "POST", path, headers, nullptr, 0, nullptr,
9638  get_multipart_content_provider(boundary, items, provider_items),
9639  content_type, progress);
9640 }
9641 
9642 inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9643  const std::string &body,
9644  const std::string &content_type,
9645  ContentReceiver content_receiver,
9646  DownloadProgress progress) {
9647  Request req;
9648  req.method = "POST";
9649  req.path = path;
9650  req.headers = headers;
9651  req.body = body;
9652  req.content_receiver =
9653  [content_receiver](const char *data, size_t data_length,
9654  size_t /*offset*/, size_t /*total_length*/) {
9655  return content_receiver(data, data_length);
9656  };
9657  req.download_progress = std::move(progress);
9658 
9659  if (max_timeout_msec_ > 0) {
9660  req.start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
9661  }
9662 
9663  if (!content_type.empty()) { req.set_header("Content-Type", content_type); }
9664 
9665  return send_(std::move(req));
9666 }
9667 
9668 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path) {
9669  return Put(path, std::string(), std::string());
9670 }
9671 
9672 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers) {
9673  return Put(path, headers, nullptr, 0, std::string());
9674 }
9675 
9676 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const char *body,
9677  size_t content_length,
9678  const std::string &content_type,
9679  UploadProgress progress) {
9680  return Put(path, Headers(), body, content_length, content_type, progress);
9681 }

9698  content_type, progress);

9715 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path,
9716  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9717  UploadProgress progress) {
9718  return Put(path, Headers(), items, progress);
9719 }
9720 
9721 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9722  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9723  UploadProgress progress) {
9724  const auto &boundary = detail::make_multipart_data_boundary();
9725  const auto &content_type =
9726  detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(boundary);
9727  const auto &body = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary);
9728  return Put(path, headers, body, content_type, progress);
9729 }
9730 
9731 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9732  const UploadFormDataItems &items,
9733  const std::string &boundary,
9734  UploadProgress progress) {
9735  if (!detail::is_multipart_boundary_chars_valid(boundary)) {
9736  return Result{nullptr, Error::UnsupportedMultipartBoundaryChars};
9737  }
9738 
9739  const auto &content_type =
9740  detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(boundary);
9741  const auto &body = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary);
9742  return Put(path, headers, body, content_type, progress);
9743 }
9744 
9745 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9746  const char *body, size_t content_length,
9747  const std::string &content_type,
9748  UploadProgress progress) {
9749  return send_with_content_provider("PUT", path, headers, body, content_length,
9750  nullptr, nullptr, content_type, progress);
9751 }
9752 
9753 inline Result ClientImpl::Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
9754  const std::string &body,
9755  const std::string &content_type,
9756  UploadProgress progress) {
9757  return send_with_content_provider("PUT", path, headers, body.data(),
9758  body.size(), nullptr, nullptr, content_type,
9759  progress);
9760 }
